Kate Moss enjoyed a night out at Elton John's Farewell Yellow Brick Road Watford concert on Monday night.

articles.author: Caitlyn Becker
articles.title: Kim Kardashian and Katy Perry 'cancel' Fourth of July 'due to a shortage of independence' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Kim Kardashian and Katy Perry are among those celebrities 'canceling' Independence Day this year 'due to a shortage of independence' after Roe v. Wade was overturned.
articles.content: Katy Perry, Jessica Chastain and Kim and Kourtney Kardashian are among those not so eager to celebrate their country's independence this year now that the right to choose was stripped away for millio… [+9640 chars]
